0.text: Innate: After casting an ability, Taric empowers his next two basic attacks within 5 seconds to each gain  100% total attack speed, deal 25 − 93 (based on level) (+ 15% bonus armor) bonus magic damage, and reduce the  current cooldowns of his basic abilities by 1 second.
0.html: Innate: After casting an ability, Taric empowers his next two basic attacks within 5 seconds to each gain  100% total attack speed, deal 25 − 93 (based on level) (+ 15% bonus armor) bonus magic damage, and reduce the  current cooldowns of his basic abilities by 1 second.
markedPassages: 100% total attack speed
25 − 93 (based on level)
current cooldowns

0.text: Active: Taric  heals himself and nearby allied champions for 25 (+ 15% AP) (+ 1% of his maximum health) per charge of Starlight's Touch that he periodically stocks, up to a maximum amount.  Bravado's empowered attacks each grant one charge.
0.html: Active: Taric heals himself and nearby allied champions for 25 (+ 15% AP) (+ 1% of his maximum health) per charge of Starlight's Touch that he periodically stocks, up to a maximum amount. Bravado's empowered attacks each grant one charge.
markedPassages: heals
Bravado's

1.text: Starlight's Touch can heal up to a maximum of 125 (+ 75% AP) (+ 5% of Taric's maximum health) at 5 charges.
1.html: Starlight's Touch can heal up to a maximum of 125 (+ 75% AP) (+ 5% of Taric's maximum health) at 5 charges.

0.text: Passive: Taric gains  bonus armor and forms a  tether between him and the ally bound by Bastion. While the tether persists, the ally also gains the bonus armor and Taric's abilities are mimicked to them, though the effects do not stack.
0.html: Passive: Taric gains  bonus armor and forms a tether between him and the ally bound by Bastion. While the tether persists, the ally also gains the bonus armor and Taric's abilities are mimicked to them, though the effects do not stack.
markedPassages: bonus armor
tether

1.text: Active: Taric grants himself and the target allied champion a  shield for 2.5 seconds, binding them with Bastion.
1.html: Active: Taric grants himself and the target allied champion a shield for 2.5 seconds, binding them with Bastion.
markedPassages: shield

2.text: Taric can also self-cast to shield himself; if he is untethered, this will instead target the nearest ally. Only one ally can be bound at a time, and selecting a new ally overrides the previous bind.
2.html: Taric can also self-cast to shield himself; if he is untethered, this will instead target the nearest ally. Only one ally can be bound at a time, and selecting a new ally overrides the previous bind.

0.text: Active: Taric winds up over 1 second, then projects a beam of starlight in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and  stuns them for 1.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Taric winds up over 1 second, then projects a beam of starlight in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and stuns them for 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: stuns

1.text: Taric can move during Dazzle's windup.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Taric can move during Dazzle's windup.

0.text: Active: Taric calls down a star from above that descends to him over 2.5 seconds. Afterwards, he and nearby allied champions become  invulnerable for 2.5 seconds.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

Keywords

  • totem
  • trinket

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+5 ability power
+30 health
+25% base health regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spoils of War: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions below ( 50% / 30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Targon's Buckler, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPOILS OF WAR: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to  execute minions below ( 50% /  30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill  gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

Keywords

Stats

+20 ability haste

+30 magic resistance

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Devotion: Grant you and allied champions within 850 units a shield for 180 − 330 (based on target's level) that decays over 2.5 seconds (90 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – DEVOTION: Grant you and allied champions within  850 units a  shield for 180 − 330 (based on target's level) that decays over 2.5 seconds (90 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Consecrate: Grant allied champions (excluding yourself) within 850 units 3 bonus armor and 3 bonus magic resistance.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 2 bonus resistances for this item's passive effect, Consecrate.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CONSECRATE: Grant allied champions (excluding yourself) within 850 units 3 bonus armor and 3 bonus magic resistance.

1.originHTML: +  +  500

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+15 ability haste
+400 health
+500 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Awe: Grants bonus health equal to 8% maximum mana.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Consumes a charge on-hit and whenever affecting an enemy or ally with an ability to grant 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 for champion targets, up to a maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Fimbulwinter at 360 bonus mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – AWE: Grants bonus health equal to 8% maximum mana.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  1000

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+400 mana
+90 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Rock Solid: Every first incoming instance of post-mitigation basic damage per cast instance is reduced by 5 (+ 3.5 per 1000 maximum health), maximum 40% reduction each.
Unique – Winter's Caress: Cripples the attack speed of enemies within 700 units by 20%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ROCK SOLID: Every first incoming instance of post-mitigation  basic damage per cast instance is reduced by 5 (+ 3.5 per 1000 maximum health), maximum 40% reduction each.

1.originHTML: +  +  800

Stats

+200 health

1.originHTML: +  400

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+400 health
+200% base health regeneration

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Pledge: Designate the target allied champion as being Worthy, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time (60 second cooldown; 1250 range).
active.originText: UNIQUE – PLEDGE: Designate the target allied champion as being Worthy, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time (60 second cooldown;  1250 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sacrifice: While your Worthy ally is tethered to you and you are above 30% of your maximum health, redirect 10% of the post-mitigation physical and magic damage they take to you as true damage and heal for 7% of the damage dealt by your Worthy ally to champions. If they are below 30% maximum health, the damage redirection is increased to 20%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SACRIFICE: While your Worthy ally is tethered to you and you are above 30% of your maximum health, redirect 10% of the post-mitigation physical and magic damage they take to you as true damage and  heal for 7% of the damage dealt by your Worthy ally to champions. If they are below 30% maximum health, the damage redirection is increased to 20%.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  400

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+250 health
+250 mana
+35 armor

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Conduit: Designate the target allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown; 1250 range).
active.originText: UNIQUE – CONDUIT: Designate the target allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown;  1250 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Convergence: Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies fire a missile at them that deals 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage upon arrival.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CONVERGENCE:  Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies fire a missile at them that deals 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage upon arrival.
